metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
resource group name where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
subscription id where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

properties.description: Raises an alert when an admin account is locked out of the Admin console (RSAIDPlus Admin Events).
properties.displayName: RSA ID Plus - Locked Administrator Account Detected
properties.query:
RSAIDPlus_AdminLogs_CL
|where activityKey == 'LOCKED_ADMIN_ACCOUNT'
|project TimeGenerated, customerName, adminUserName, adminUserRole, activityKey, sourceIPAddress

alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: RSA ID Plus Administrator - {{{adminUserName}} is locked out.
alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Administrator - {{{adminUserName}} with Role - {{{adminUserRole}} got locked out of Admin Console at: {{{TimeGenerated}}

properties.displayName: RSA ID Plus - Locked Administrator Account Detected
RSA ID Plus Admin Logs Connector

connectorUiConfig.title: RSA ID Plus Admin Logs Connector
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The RSA ID Plus AdminLogs Connector provides the capability to ingest [Cloud Admin Console Audit Events](https://community.rsa.com/s/article/Cloud-Administration-Event-Log-API-5d22ba17) into Microsoft Sentinel using Cloud Admin APIs.

graphQueries.legend: RSA ID Plus Admin Activity Events Received

sampleQueries.description: All RSA ID Plus Admin Activity Logs

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required.

customs.name: RSA ID Plus API Authentication
customs.description: To access the Admin APIs, a valid Base64URL encoded JWT token, signed with the client's Legacy Administration API key is required.

instructionSteps.description: >**NOTE:** This connector uses Codeless Connector Framework (CCF) to connect to the RSA ID Plus Cloud Admin APIs to pull logs into Microsoft Sentinel.

instructionSteps.title: **STEP 1** - Create Legacy Admin API Client in Cloud Admin Console.
**STEP 2** - Generate the Base64URL encoded JWT Token.
instructionSteps.description: Follow the steps mentioned in this [page](https://community.rsa.com/s/article/Authentication-for-the-Cloud-Administration-APIs-a04e3fb9) under the header 'Legacy Administration API'.

instructionSteps.title: **STEP 3** - Configure the Cloud Admin API to start ingesting Admin event logs into Microsoft Sentinel.
**STEP 4** - Click Connect
instructionSteps.description: Verify all the fields above were filled in correctly. Press Connect to start the connector.

dataFlows.transformKql:
source
| extend TimeGenerated = todatetime(eventLogDate)
| project-away eventLogDate

schema.name: RSAIDPlus_AdminLogs_CL
schema.description: This table is used to store the admin audit event data.

properties.displayName: RSA ID Plus Admin Logs Connector

connectorDefinitionName.defaultValue: RSA ID Plus Admin Logs Connector

metadata.description: Enter the receiver email id to receive error mails.

metadata.title: SendEmailonRSAIDPlusAlert
metadata.description: Sends an email notification when an RSA ID Plus analytic rule triggers. This playbook can be linked via automation rules.
prerequisites: An O365 account to be used to send email notification. The user account will be used in O365 connector (Send an email)
postDeployment: **In Microsoft Sentinel, analytics rules should be configured to trigger an Incident.**
1. Select the **RSAIDPlus_LockedAdminAccount_AnalyticRule** analytic rule you have deployed.
5. Provide name for your rule, In Actions dropdown select **Run playbook**
6. In second dropdown select your deployed playbook

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

• Review the solution Release Notes

• There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The RSA ID Plus Admin Logs Data Connector enables seamless integration between RSA ID Plus and Microsoft Sentinel. This connector ingests Admin Events logs from RSA ID Plus Cloud Administration Console using the RSA Admin API and stores them securely in your Azure Log Analytics (ALA) workspace. These logs can then be used for monitoring, analysis, and threat detection within Microsoft Sentinel.

Data Connectors: 1, Analytic Rules: 1, Playbooks: 1

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
